description:
A bonus costume for Ryu Hayabusa will be added.
Enjoy the new battle experience!

■Content
Bonus Costume for "Ryu Hayabusa"

■How to use
You can change costumes from camp by selecting "Party" - "Select Costume".

*This content is only applicable to the WARRIORS OROCHI 4 Ultimate, it cannot be used in WARRIORS OROCHI 4 base game.
name: Bonus Costume for Ryu Hayabusa
